references.paper_title: Diffusion policy: Visuomotor policy learning via action diffusion
references.reason: This paper introduces Diffusion Policies for visuomotor policy learning and serves as the foundation for subsequent research in this area.
This work introduces Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPMs), the core model behind Diffusion Policies and other diffusion-based generative approaches.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper introduces the EDM framework, which improved the efficiency and sampling speed of diffusion models used in this work for representing policies.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This work develops the theoretical foundation for score-based diffusion models, which are an alternative formulation of DDPMs and are widely used in diffusion-based applications.

references.paper_title: Generative modeling by estimating gradients of the data distribution
references.reason: This paper introduces score matching, a crucial component for training score-based diffusion models used as policies in this research.
